simple_php_webshell_file_upload.description: Simple webshell with file upload capability

call_ps_from_webshell.description: Calling powershell directly from a webshell

exec_stage2_from_smb.description: Execution of stage2 payload directly from SMB share

single_get_cmd.description: Simplest of simple webshell, executing one command

exec_cmd_from_get_param.description: Execute commands as input form GET url parameters. Very simple webshell.

passthru_webshell.description: Simple webshell using PHP passthru method

shell_exec_webshell.description: Simple shell_exec webshell. There will be no output from this method unless you echo it with a separate call.

exec_webshell.description: Exec method webshell. Not useful for output, just execution - won't be able to see any STDOUT

exec_with_print_webshell.description: Exec webshell that puts output in an array and will display

preg_replace_webshell.description: This is a nifty trick - preg_replace webshell

backtick_execution_php.description: PHP webshell with backticks as execution - has to be a nix platform for this to work.
